thread.title: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard says it’ll be ‘very difficult’ for Reds to win the Premier League after Swansea capitulation
thread.title_full: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard says it’ll be ‘very difficult’ for Reds to win the Premier League after Swansea capitulation

author: dfraser
title: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard says it’ll be ‘very difficult’ for Reds to win the Premier League after Swansea capitulation
text:
EFL Stevie's Reds Mist Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard says it’ll be ‘very difficult’ for Reds to win the Premier League after Swansea capitulation 
Former Kop idol said it was always the same when he was a player, throwing away the title against the weaker sides By Dave Fraser
